/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush greenery, with trees and shrubs adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. A highway overpass stretches across the scene, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive view. The image is bathed in the bright sunlight of the day, casting sharp shadows and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
